== Software ==
[[File:Android 4.0.png|thumb|left|200px|[[Android (operating system)|Android]] 4.0, the operating system of the Galaxy Nexus]]
[[File:Android 4.0.png|thumb|left|200px|[[Android (operating system)|Android]] 4.0, the operating system of the Galaxy Nexus]]
â
Galaxy Nexus is the first device to run [[Android (operating system)|Android]] [[Ice Cream Sandwich (operating system)|4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)]],<ref name="yahoo143600226">[http://news.yahoo.com/googles-nexus-prime-android-4-0-ice-cream-143600226.html Google's 'Nexus Prime' with Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich allegedly set for October release]</ref> introducing a large number of new features and improvements including, but not limited to, Face Unlock,<ref name="bare_url">[http://developer.android.com/sdk/android-4.0-highlights.html Android 4.0 Platform Highlights | Android Developers<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/18/android-ice-cream-sandwich-adds-face-unlock-feature/ Android Ice Cream Sandwich adds Face Unlock feature - Engadget<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> voice typing,<ref name="bare_url" /> Android Beam (using [[Near field communication|NFC]]),<ref name="bare_url" /><ref>[http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/18/google-announces-nfc-based-android-beam-for-sharing-between-phon/ Google announces NFC-based Android Beam for sharing between phones (video) - Engadget<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> [[Wi-Fi Direct]]<ref name="bare_url" /> among others.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://developer.android.com/sdk/android-4.0-highlights.html |title=Android 4.0 Platform Highlights | Android Developers |publisher=Developer.android.com |date= |accessdate=2011-10-27}}</ref>
+
Galaxy Nexus is the first device to run [[Android (operating system)|Android]] [[List of Android operating system versions#4.x Ice Cream Sandwich|4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)]],<ref name="yahoo143600226">[http://news.yahoo.com/googles-nexus-prime-android-4-0-ice-cream-143600226.html Google's 'Nexus Prime' with Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich allegedly set for October release]</ref> introducing a large number of new features and improvements including, but not limited to, Face Unlock,<ref name="bare_url">[http://developer.android.com/sdk/android-4.0-highlights.html Android 4.0 Platform Highlights | Android Developers<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/18/android-ice-cream-sandwich-adds-face-unlock-feature/ Android Ice Cream Sandwich adds Face Unlock feature - Engadget<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> voice typing,<ref name="bare_url" /> Android Beam (using [[Near field communication|NFC]]),<ref name="bare_url" /><ref>[http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/18/google-announces-nfc-based-android-beam-for-sharing-between-phon/ Google announces NFC-based Android Beam for sharing between phones (video) - Engadget<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> [[Wi-Fi Direct]]<ref name="bare_url" /> among others.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://developer.android.com/sdk/android-4.0-highlights.html |title=Android 4.0 Platform Highlights | Android Developers |publisher=Developer.android.com |date= |accessdate=2011-10-27}}</ref>
